mapper.insert: INSERT INTO complete( memberCode, completeName, completeStart, completeEnd, completeTime, completeAcademyName, completeNo, completeFile, completeDate) VALUES ( #{memberCode}, #{completeName}, #{completeStart}, #{completeEnd}, #{completeTime}, #{completeAcademyName} , #{completeNo}, #{completeFile}, now())
